subject: RE: Mega Menu is ready to review!

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed
Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Pending

full_threads.body:
Hi Lucy,

Sure we have now removed the extra material bank section - not sure how that snuck in. Good catch, thank you.

Heath Maguire
DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au

Heath,

Just noticed that there are 4 news pieces listed at the bottom of the homepage (I thought we originally only had 3) and now there is a repeat of the material bank news piece.



Could you please have this updated ASAP

Thanks!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Thanks - looks great!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy, 

Great news, confirming the updated home page and menu structure is now live on both the AU and global sites. 

Please let us know if you would like any further tweaks?

Hey Heath,

Correct – let’s go live on the new design and mega menu – thanks!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310
Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000
acoufelt.com <http://www.acoufelt.com/>

Hi Lucy,

Ok sure no problems, we will tweak the responsive views as well.

Sounds like we are ok to roll out the new mega menu too?

Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire
DIRECTOR

On 9 Jul 2020, at 5:17 pm, Lucy Pittman | Acoufelt <lucy.pittman@acoufelt.com <mailto:lucy.pittman@acoufelt.com>> wrote:

Hey Heath,

We’ve been working hard on redesigning this and are happy with where we are at. We are ready to carry this across to the Aus and global website:

https://acoufelt.com/au/home-new/ <https://acoufelt.com/au/home-new/>

My only comments – we will need to add the ‘Weave’ collection to this (under ‘Panels’).

Also, can you please also take a look at fixing the thickness of the menu-bar when you adjust or reduce the window size?

<image002.png>

Thanks Heath – please let me know once this has been completed.

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310
Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000
acoufelt.com <http://www.acoufelt.com/>

<image001.png>

Subject: Re: Mega Menu is ready to review!

[EXTERNAL] This email came from outside Acoufelt. Don't click links or open files unless you trust the sender.
Hi Lucy and Ben,

We have created a revised home page, by ‘cherry picking’ some of the imagery and messaging.

The images are a larger scale format and we have added some subtle animation to really make them the hero.

The content and images can be swapped out, but I’m keen to see if you like this direction: https://acoufelt.com/au/home-new/ <https://acoufelt.com/au/home-new/>

Note, not optimised for tablet and mobile as yet.

Thanks,
HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU <https://wolfiq.com.au/>
E. heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au> | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

<https://wolfiq.com.au/>

Warm regards,

Warm regards,

[EXTERNAL] This email came from outside Acoufelt. Don't click links or open files unless you trust the sender.
Hi Lucy,

Thanks for your patience with this one, I was holding as I wanted to incorporate some US suggestions. I can action this today.

Question, do all 11 elements need to be on the home page? I think it may be a little busy? Could we cull it down to 6 items (that are a priority). I believe Ben originally mentioned 6 as below, but let me know if this has changed?

Thanks,
HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU <https://wolfiq.com.au/>
E. heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au> | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

<https://wolfiq.com.au/>

Hey Heath,

How are you going on this one – did you need any other content or direction from me or Ben?

Let me know. Thanks!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman

From: Lucy Pittman | Acoufelt
Sent: Thursday, 7 May 2020 1:08 PM
To: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>; Ben Grace | Acoufelt <ben.grace@acoufelt.com <mailto:ben.grace@acoufelt.com>>
Subject: RE: Mega Menu is ready to review!

Hey Heath,

Have selected a few of my personal faves below – be good for you to make a selection from these based on size/colour etc (labelled 1-11)

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/n0ox6j3ognhowya/AAA-RfV0MMTUVcf2kDzbrEfZa?dl=0 <https://www.dropbox.com/sh/n0ox6j3ognhowya/AAA-RfV0MMTUVcf2kDzbrEfZa?dl=0>

Suggested Copy:

Acoufelt is all about Making Quiet™ in shared spaces for better working, learning and living: READ MORE – LINK: https://acoufelt.com/au/about-us/ <https://acoufelt.com/au/about-us/>
Our Acoustic FWC™ Philosophy looks at all six surfaces in a room, the floor, four walls and the ceiling. The starting point is the floor: VIEW CARPET COLLECTIONS: https://acoufelt.com/au/carpet-tiles/ <https://acoufelt.com/au/carpet-tiles/>
Acoustic solutions for flexible learning space at Westmount School: VIEW CASE STUDY - https://acoufelt.com/portfolio/acoustic-floor-solution-for-westmount-school/ <https://acoufelt.com/portfolio/acoustic-floor-solution-for-westmount-school/>
QuietPrintTM applies print technology that colours the fibre with high precision, whilst ensuring air-gaps in the porous material remain open to absorbing noise: READ MORE – LINK: https://acoufelt.com/au/quietprint/ <https://acoufelt.com/au/quietprint/>
Acoustic panels with a bevelled ‘chevron’ groove. VIEW THE FRACTURE COLLECTION: https://acoufelt.com/product/fracture-chevron-acoustic-panel/ <https://acoufelt.com/product/fracture-chevron-acoustic-panel/>
No acoustic compromise for immersive tasting room experience at Dowie Doole Cellar Door. VIEW CASE STUDY - https://acoufelt.com/portfolio/no-compromise-for-immersive-tasting-room-experience/ <https://acoufelt.com/portfolio/no-compromise-for-immersive-tasting-room-experience/>
The Cloud collection is available in Rectangle, Hexagon and Circle, and offered across our full range of colours. VIEW CEILING CLOUD COLLECTION:https://acoufelt.com/clouds/ <https://acoufelt.com/clouds/>
WoodBeQuiet™ is the synchronisation of visual beauty, superior sound absorption and environmental sensitivity. VIEW WOODBEQUIET COLLECTION:https://acoufelt.com/woodbequiet/ <https://acoufelt.com/woodbequiet/>
Desk Solutions: Desk Modules for safe and health working, with increased acoustic comfort: READ MORE: https://acoufelt.com/au/open-office-solutions/ <https://acoufelt.com/au/open-office-solutions/>
Telstra Office Refresh: Acoustic desk modules for Privacy, flexibility, and modern aesthetic design. VIEW PROJECT SNAPSHOT: https://acoufelt.com/project/telstra-office/ <https://acoufelt.com/project/telstra-office/>
The Ceiling Baffle Collection is available in 3 shapes: Linear, Ripple, and Wing, and offered across our full range of colorways. VIEW CEILING BAFFLE COLLECTION:https://acoufelt.com/baffles/ <https://acoufelt.com/baffles/>

Thanks Heath – let me know if there’s anything else you’re needing!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000
acoufelt.com <http://www.acoufelt.com/>

On 5 May 2020, at 3:32 pm, Ben Grace | Acoufelt <ben.grace@acoufelt.com <mailto:ben.grace@acoufelt.com>> wrote:

Hi Heath,

I would like to further refine this before sharing and pushing live.

The menu across the top needs to go Acoustic FWC > Floor > Wall > Ceiling > Inspiration > Company > Contact
Replace the carpet tile images in the menu with room shots rather than face tiles and same as for WoodBeQuiet on the walls (Leave WoodBeQuiet ceiling as is)
Under the Company page, I would like to push Global Advisory Board, Whitepapers and Brands down to the footer
Replace the current FWC home area with 6 stunning photos with 1. Desk divider 2. Ceiling 3. Wall 4. Ceiling 5 Wall 6. Floor (Lucy to provide overlay white copy for context)
We will revisit the rest of the home page in the coming weeks

I think the rest of the home page comes back to getting clearer on strategy which will automatically clean it up for all regions.


Warm regards,

Ben Grace
Managing Director - Global

t +61 1800.62.64.62 m +61 407.075.840
Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000
acoufelt.com <http://www.acoufelt.com/>

<image003.png>

From: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>
Sent: Tuesday, 28 April 2020 8:52 PM
To: Ben Grace | Acoufelt <ben.grace@acoufelt.com <mailto:ben.grace@acoufelt.com>>; Lucy Pittman | Acoufelt <lucy.pittman@acoufelt.com <mailto:lucy.pittman@acoufelt.com>>
Subject: Mega Menu is ready to review!

[EXTERNAL] This email came from outside Acoufelt. Don't click links or open files unless you trust the sender.
Hi Ben and Lucy,

As promised, here is the mega menu, we have activated it on a hidden page here: https://acoufelt.com/au/mega-menu-demo/ <https://acoufelt.com/au/mega-menu-demo/>

We have used a tabbed style setup to allow enough screen realestate to make it all clickable, functional and easy to digest. I think this is a great in between from the original and the vision of the US model. Let me know what you think?

Note, it’s not fully optimised for smaller devices, I wanted to check in with you prior to tidying it all up.

Thanks and speak soon,
